title: Hampton National Historic Site: Pets
body: Pets       Pets are welcome at Hampton National Historic Site though there are some general rules that pet owners should follow during their visit. Pets are not allowed in any of the park buildings. Service dogs are the exception. Pets must be restrained on a leash at all times while in the park - on a leash not more than 6 feet long and owners are required to clean up after their pets. Pets are not to be left in personal vehicles.
